recommended_actions.description: Resolve WETH→ETH unwrap blocker for d044 completion
recommended_actions.action: B#319 executed gasless swap (5 USDC → 0.002586 WETH). HiveMind participation still blocked because WETH→ETH unwrap requires gas (chicken-and-egg). Options per d044 notes: (1) smart wallet migration for gasless unwrap, (2) receive ETH from any source, (3) find relay service. Next B session with financial work should investigate option 3 (relay services like permit2) or option 1 (smart wallet migration).
